summary: Both previously flagged INSERT statements were updated to include pool_id and reserved/consumed values, isolating the CHECK constraint behavior as requested.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: tba_deposit CHECK test could fail due to NULL pool_id and omitted reserved/consumed columns
previous_issues_status.notes: Insert now provides pool_id='general' and reserved_micro/consumed_micro=0.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: invalid source_type test could fail due to NULL pool_id and omitted reserved/consumed columns
previous_issues_status.notes: Insert now provides pool_id='general' and reserved_micro/consumed_micro=0.
